cloudsim.ext
Class InternetCharacteristics

java.lang.Object
  cloudsim.ext.InternetCharacteristics

public class InternetCharacteristics
extends java.lang.Object

This class holds the data that define the behaviour of the Internet which includes latencies and bandwidth, and also provides methods to access those information. This class is a singleton.

Author:
Bhathiya Wickremasinghe
